document_data.name: Syllving
document_data.mainbody: Fist '''Syllving''' was a [[healer]] of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Syllving was a [[gold dwarf]] woman with a clean-shaven face, light skin, light brown eyes, and strawberry blonde hair. She wore a set of [[splint mail]] armor decorated with a [[tabard]] embroidered with the Flaming Fist insignia. Fist Syllving wielded a [[warhammer]] and defended herself with a [[shield]] when on duty.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Syllving was ordered to lend her healing magics to the Fists patrolling the Lower City, along the [[Wendserpent Street]], and near the [[Manor Gate]], accompanied by a group of fellow Fists and a [[steel watcher]].
